title: Maybe the public will punish them in next election or god will, Why bother salaried tax payers.
selftext:
When a commoner makes a mistake, prison.

When a politician commits a crime, the people will punish him/her in the next elections. 

Most politicians take loans and never repay, as the same is then categorised as bad loan.

Hypocrisy ki bhi seema hoti hai
Hai
